/usr/bin/c++  -W -Wall -pedantic -Wno-non-virtual-dtor -Wno-long-long -Wwrite-strings -Wpointer-arith -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-variadic-macros -Wshadow -pipe -DG4USE_STD11 -pthread -ftls-model=initial-exec -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG -fno-trapping-math -ftree-vectorize -fno-math-errno  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/PEN.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/ActionInitialization.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/DetectorConstruction.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/DetectorMessenger.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/EventAction.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/LightGuideConstruction.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/PenMaterials.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/PhysicsList.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/PrimaryGeneratorAction.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/PrimaryGeneratorMessenger.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/RunAction.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/SiliconPlateConstruction.cc.o CMakeFiles/PEN.dir/src/SteppingAction.cc.o  -o PEN  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/geant4/lib64:/opt/hdf5/lib:/opt/clhep/lib: /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4Tree.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4GMocren.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4visHepRep.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4RayTracer.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4VRML.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4OpenGL.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4gl2ps.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4interfaces.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4persistency.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4error_propagation.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4readout.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4physicslists.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4parmodels.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4FR.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4vis_management.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4modeling.so -lXm -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lXt -lXmu -lGL -lGLU -lQtOpenGL -lQtGui -lQtGui_debug -lQtCore -lQtCore_debug -lxerces-c /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4run.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4event.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4tracking.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4processes.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4analysis.so /opt/hdf5/lib/libhdf5.so -lpthread -ldl -lm -lfreetype -lz -lexpat /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4digits_hits.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4track.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4particles.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4geometry.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4materials.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4graphics_reps.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4intercoms.so /opt/geant4/lib64/libG4global.so /opt/clhep/lib/libCLHEP-2.4.1.0.so
